lead_paragraph: A top aide to President-elect Donald Trump said in an interview aired on Sunday that the White House may have disproportionately punished Russia by ordering the expulsion of 35 suspected Russian spies.
snippet: A top aide to President-elect Donald Trump said in an interview aired on Sunday that the White House may have disproportionately punished Russia by ordering the expulsion of 35 suspected Russian spies....

headline.main: Trump Aide Says U.S. Sanctions on Russia May Be Disproportionate
headline.print_headline: Trump Aide Says U.S. Sanctions on Russia May Be Disproportionate
